Frequently Asked Questions

Answers to common concerns and inquiries.

Can I try it for free?

Yes, we offer a 7-day trial so you can explore all features without commitment.

Do you have hidden fees?

No hidden fees. Our pricing is transparent with no surprises.

What payment methods do you accept?

We accept credit/debit cards, PayPal, and secure Stripe payments.

How often do you release updates?

Updates are rolled out bi-weekly to enhance features and security.

What is your refund policy?

You’re eligible for a full refund within 14 days of purchase, no questions asked.

How can I contact you?

Use the form below or email us anytime. We're quick to respond.

Still have questions?
